message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
